name: SOTP
body:
### ++++++ Sum of the Parts Speaker Series ++++++ 

Great ideas come from different corners. Solving murky design problems often involves a crazy cocktail of people, talent, circumstance, data, and a good chunk of courage. At Autodesk we are inviting innovative people to talk candidly about the hard problems theyâ€™ve faced and how they have succeeded. We want to extend the invitation to others in San Francisco to be part of the conversation.
